titleStmt.title: Chewton 28 of July, 1658 VVhereas wee of the mineral grand jury finding by a decretal order of our predecessors May 28, and their letter May 2 in answer of Tho. Bushell's Esq; to incourage him to go on in his adventures ...

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and first lines of text.
Signed at end: Jo. Redford for-man of the mineral grand jury there [and 11 others].
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Law Library.
Wing reel guide incorrectly lists item at 1900:3 as W452B.
